title: [Need Help] XF Image Cropper
body:
Hi Guys

I have create Xamarin Forms cross platform ImageCroper using skiasharp customrenderer .
Which works properly in UWP(Desktop). But having many issue in IOS, Andorid and UWP mobile.
Like performance, UI lags too much. 
And touch is not working properly.

Plz just look at once. 
https://github.com/AiCraft/XFImageCroper

Thanks And Regards
